isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR 3406B -1991 - SERVICE INFORMATION

svcproc.title: SERVICE INFORMATION
svcproc.para: The following documents are available from Caterpillar, Inc. to aid in the maintenance and troubleshooting of PEEC-equipped engines:
SENR3570 - Service Manual for PEEC Truck Engines
SEBP1769/1770 - Parts Manual for 3406B PEEC Engine

Also available from Caterpillar is an adapter cable to allow the ECAP and/or DDT service tool to connect to the 8-way data link connector used in every PEEC-or-3176 equipped vehicle. Order Caterpillar part number 7X1403 from your Caterpillar Dealer.
The above documents can be obtained by contacting your local Caterpillar Dealer or ordered from:
